synthesis_summary: The agent team has reached consensus on a plan to update `SPEC-KIT-045-mini` documentation and status tracking. Key actions involve refreshing `tasks.md` and `SPEC.md` to align with the latest 2025-10-14 telemetry, generating necessary evidence files (roster, schema checks), and validating the changes with `lint_tasks.py`.

action_items.description: Read `docs/SPEC-KIT-045-mini/tasks.md` and `SPEC.md` to gather context for updates.
Construct and execute `replace` calls to update `tasks.md` and `SPEC.md` with new telemetry data and status for T49.
Execute the `jq` command to extract the roster from the plan telemetry and save it as evidence.
Run the `scripts/spec-kit/lint_tasks.py` script to ensure `SPEC.md` is valid.
Note the pending status of HAL mock validation evidence.

agreements: All agents agree on the necessity of updating `tasks.md` and `SPEC.md`.
The plan to use `replace` for file updates and `run_shell_command` for validation is accepted.
The requirement to generate roster and schema check evidence is confirmed.
conflicts: No major conflicts. There is an acknowledged information gap regarding the precise commands for `jq` schema checks and HAL mock generation, which are flagged as follow-up items.
